plugin.name: MN
plugin.description: The MN plugin is designed to compute the Canadian Nuttli magnitude according to the Geological Survey of Canada.

parameter.name: velocityModel
parameter.description: The travel time table set compiled for LocSAT. The tables are located in "share/locsat/tables/[vmodel].*".

parameter.name: region
parameter.description: The path to the BNA file which defines the valid region for the MN magnitude. Note that the entire path from source to receiver must lie entirely within the polygon(s).

parameter.name: rms
parameter.description: Whether to use RMS ratio of signal and noise window for SNR computation or the ration of the peak-trough amplitudes of either window.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description:
The configurable filter such that the V measurement is made on a filtered trace. By default, filtering is not enabled.
See https://docs.gempa.de/seiscomp3/current/base/filter-grammar.html for how to specify the filter.

parameter.name: Vmin
parameter.description: The minimum phase velocity used to determine the signal window end.

parameter.name: Vmax
parameter.description: The maximum phase velocity used to determine the signal window start.

parameter.name: snrWindowSeconds
parameter.description: The length of the SNR window.

parameter.name: noiseWindowPreSeconds
parameter.description: The offset of the noise window. A positive value will move the computed noise window to the left on the time axis, a negative value will move it to the right on the time axis.

parameter.name: signalStartPriorities
parameter.description:
The priority list of phase onsets to compute the signal start window. Except for Vmin and Vmax, associated phases (arrivals) must be present in the origin for this particular phase. Picked phases are only considered if the origin is a manual origin or the pick is a manual pick. The first value in the list which can be retrieved or computed, is selected.
Allowed tokens: Pg, Pn, P, Sg, Sn, S, Lg, Rg, Vmin, Vmax

parameter.name: signalEndPriorities
parameter.description:
The priority list of phase onsets to compute the signal end window. Except for Vmin and Vmax, associated phases (arrivals) must be present in the origin for this particular phase. Picked phases are only considered if the origin is a manual origin or the pick is a manual pick. The first value in the list which can be retrieved or computed, is selected.
Allowed tokens: Pg, Pn, P, Sg, Sn, S, Lg, Rg, Vmin, Vmax

parameter.name: minSNR
parameter.description: The minimum SNR required for a magnitude to pass the QC check. The station magnitude will be computed anyway but if the SNR is below this threshold it will be associated with weight zero and will not contribute to the network magnitude.

parameter.name: minPeriod
parameter.description: The minimum period required for a magnitude to pass the QC check. The station magnitude will be computed anyway but if the period is below this threshold it will be associated with weight zero and will not contribute to the network magnitude.

parameter.name: maxPeriod
parameter.description: The maximum period allowed for a magnitude to pass the QC check. The station magnitude will be computed anyway but if the period is above this threshold it will be associated with weight zero and will not contribute to the network magnitude.

parameter.name: minDist
parameter.description: The minimum distance required for a magnitude to pass the QC check. The station magnitude will be computed anyway but if the distance is below this threshold it will be associated with weight zero and will not contribute to the network magnitude.

parameter.name: maxDist
parameter.description: The maximum distance allowed for a magnitude to be computed. If the distance exceeds this threshold then the computation will be canceled and no station magnitude will be available at all.
